body_html:
On the cpu, accreal type for float32 inputs is double, so in many cases for fp32 inputs intermediate computations will be in double

Shouldn't that mean that the outputs computed with cunn and on cpu should differ?
body_text:

body:
> On the cpu, accreal type for float32 inputs is double, so in many cases for fp32 inputs intermediate computations will be in double

Shouldn't that mean that the outputs computed with cunn and on cpu should differ?
